pkgmetadata.longdescription: QA Machina Indicators // Performs QA on Machina (see https://machi.na/ for more information) algebraic indicators 'sma' (simple moving average), 'wavg' (weighted average),'xavg' (exponential moving average), 'hma' (Hull moving average), 'adma' (adaptive moving average), 'tsi' (true strength index), 'rsi' (relative strength index), 'gauss' (Gaussian elimination), 'momo' (momentum), 't3' (triple exponential moving average), 'macd' (moving average convergence divergence).
